name: Bon Bon
description:
Created by: Wejdan Al-Ahmadi

Modifications: 

  1. Re-skinned the game and changed it to fit a candy theme. 
  2. Created 2 unique levels of varying difficulty. 
  3. Modified all prefabs (materials and textures) with new 3D models to fit the aesthetic. 
  4. Modified the textures and materials of all prefabs to fit an uplifting themed game. 
  5. Added a dialogue system with animations. 
  6. Added a "You die" screen separate from the defeat screen. 
  7. Changed the music. 
  8. Created art for UI icons and menu and changed the menu's skin and colors. 
  9. Created a win screen with art I drew. 

Assets used were from MSU, Unity asset store. 

Extra 3D models from itch.io. 

Music from epidemic sound.
